comments.content: It looks like a manually compressed **[Eurostile Extended (Bold)](http://web.archive.org/web/20140830125355/http:/www.findmyfont.com/index.php/fonts/font-preview?fset=Linotype&ffam=Eurostile%20LT%20ExtendedTwo%20-%20Bold&fid=c852020aced5686c3c394686970e8d85&fsize=60&text=ROMANS&wrap=2)**
